item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Since covid.. I have been thinking about quitting my job!!

But these moments when it hits you feel like you are a dreamer or a fairy tail (you wonder why this idea is happening in your mind? Why do you even feel this way?) and fear comes to take the courage aways. So I convinced myself that I can do it, while working and studying. For a fact I couldn’t do, since â€œBurnout is realâ€.

Because there are other personal responsibilities, personal care, and friends time weekly.

So, on Nov-2024 I quit the job and I am thinking of doing the things that were hunting my mind when I was working. Like blogging, creating a brand, and digital drawing. To be honest fear is eating my head about not achieving the goal or it might be a studpied ideaâ€¦ but the relief Iâ€™m feeling makes me like the idea of keeping it up.

Therefore, Let me see what I can do till 2025 finishes.
